snippet.title: The Top 5 Stories on LinkedIn: The Leadership Lessons of CEO James T. Kirk
snippet.description:
* Daniel Roth
The Top 5 Stories on LinkedIn: The Leadership Lessons of CEO James T. Kirk Daniel Roth March 9, 2012
I get it: It’s tough and lonely being a leader. You can’t always ask people around you for answers — you’re supposed to have them, not seek them! — so sometimes you’re forced to grab inspiration wherever you can. And this week, the professional world picked two sources: an Inc. roundup of great leadership qualities. And lessons from Captain James T. Kirk. From Star Trek. Here’s the full list: Top 5 most-shared articles by LinkedIn members (March…
* Topics: * LinkedIn News
